partners: Music artists, record labels, streaming platforms

unfairAdvantage: Advanced AI algorithms, focus on user experience, constant updates and improvements

commonGoals: Creating a go-to app for songwriters and lyricists
personalGoals: Simplify the lyric writing process and inspire creativity

weaknessesAndRisks: Competition from existing lyric resources, potential copyright issues
